statements: SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, contraindications FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT interaction_description, drug_name FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%severe%';
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 5;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id < 10 ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%severe%' ORDER BY drug_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, contraindications FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY contraindications ASC;
SELECT drug_id, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY drug_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contraindications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, contraindication_description FROM contraindications WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE id = 100;
SELECT drug_name, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE id > 50 ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM drug_interactions;
SELECT drug_name, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM drug_interactions GROUP BY drug_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions
SELECT interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 1
SELECT drug_id, interaction_id, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY interaction_id DESC
SELECT * FROM contraindications WHERE contraindication_description LIKE '%warning%'
SELECT drug_id, contraindication_description FROM contraindications ORDER BY drug_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY drug_id DESC, interaction_id ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 3 AND interaction_id <= 5;
SELECT drug_id, interaction_id, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY interaction_id ASC;
SELECT drug_id, interaction_id, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_description LIKE '%severe%';
SELECT drug_id, interaction_id, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE drug_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT drug_name, contraindication_description FROM contraindications WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT first_drug_name, second_drug_name FROM drug_interactions WHERE interaction_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM labeling_regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE 'FDA%';
SELECT drug_name, requires_compliance FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY requires_compliance DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM drug_interactions WHERE first_drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND second_drug_name = 'Ibuprofen';
SELECT id, interaction_description FROM drug_interactions WHERE id = 3;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM labeling_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contraindications WHERE drug_name LIKE '%Paracetamol%';
SELECT drug_name, requires_compliance FROM compliance_checks WHERE requires_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Drug;
SELECT id, name FROM Drug ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Interaction WHERE interaction_type='Severe';
SELECT drug_id, interaction_description FROM Interaction WHERE drug_id=1;
SELECT name, description FROM Drug WHERE id=2;
SELECT * FROM Drug;
SELECT name, description FROM Drug WHERE id = 1;
SELECT Drug.name, Interaction.interaction_type, Interaction.interaction_description FROM Drug JOIN Interaction ON Drug.id = Interaction.drug_id;
SELECT Drug.name, Contraindication.contraindication_type, Contraindication.contraindication_description FROM Drug JOIN Contraindication ON Drug.id = Contraindication.drug_id WHERE Drug.id = 2;

SELECT Drug.name, LabelingRegulation.regulation_name, DrugLabeling.labeling_date FROM Drug JOIN DrugLabeling ON Drug.id = DrugLabeling.drug_id JOIN LabelingRegulation ON DrugLabeling.regulation_id = LabelingRegulation.id;
